required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of 18F-AV-133 Positron Emission Tomography (PET)
clinical_study.official_title: A Preliminary Evaluation of the Safety and Pancreas Imaging Properties of 18F-AV-133 in Healthy Volunteers and in Patients With Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and pancreas imaging properties of 18F-AV-133.

primary_outcome.measure: Pancreatic uptake and clearance of 18F-AV-133 tracer as determined by SUVR
